item.title: Michael Ellis Fisher: CV and achievements
item.description: arXiv:2410.07235v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: This text was supposed to be included in the book "50 years of the renormalization group, Dedicated to the Memory of Michael E. Fisher", edited by A. Aharony, O. Entin-Wohlman, D. Huse and L. Radzihovsky, World Scientific, Singapore (2024). It will be included in future printings and in the electronic version of the book.
item.dc:creator: Amnon Aharony, Mustansir Barma
